name: MC Loph
description: '''MC Loph''' (1973 â€“ 14 September 2011), born '''Nwaozor Obiajulu''', was a Nigerian rapper and disc jockey known for his contributions to the [[Igbo rap]] genre. He rose to national prominence with his remix of highlife legend [[Chief Stephen Osita Osadebe|Chief Osita Osadebe]] classic song, "Osondi Owendi", featuring [[Flavour N'abania]].
